MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L20 postcode area of Bootle, affecting properties in Wadham Road, Stanley Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.33PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30pm on 10th March 2021.
